channel.title: Php on Simon Wild
channel.description: Recent content in Php on Simon Wild

item.title: US Map Drupal 7
item.description: Creates a state clickable map which pulls data from a table in a Drupal 7 database.

item.title: Exxon Vote Tool
item.description: This project triggers events on user actions such as when a event item has enough votes, it becomes approved or not approved. Emails are triggered to let event organisers know if an item is approved. All votes are displayed in a view.
